title: Can't check my Pixel2's IMEI on Google's site
content:
Hi! I received a Pixel2 as a gift. But I couldn't check my IMEI on google's repair site. The site showed "For the device with this IMEI or serial number, youâ€™ll have to check the Hardware Warranty Center to see your repair options " after I entered IMEI. I wonder why...
Many thanks!
